DOC.brief_summary: Twelve healthy volunteer fit inclusion exclusion criterion provide write informed consent participate trial recruit compare rate extent absorption pharmacokinetics newly formulate Gamma-Delta formulation TRF .
DOC.brief_title: Gamma-delta Tocotrienol Potential Maintenance Treatment Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Twelve healthy subject admit clinical study ward Day 0 . Physical check health status confirm check . After fast minimum 10 hour overnight , subject administer single dose TRF Gamma-Delta take standardized high-fat meal breakfast Day 1 . Thereafter , standard meal provide 4 12 hour dose . Blood sample ( 5mL take use in-dwelling canula place antecubital vein immediately 0.5 , 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 7 , 8 , 10 , 14 , 24 hour dose . Subjects admit 24 hour discharge last blood sample . During study , blood pressure heart rate monitor regularly safety profile . After one week wash period , subject return ward give formulation ( TRF GDT ) procedures repeat . Any adverse event arise treatment record follow till resolution .
DOC.criteria: Male female age 2155 year old Good health No allergy vitamin E/ palm oil No past ( within 3 month ) / current use dietary supplement contain vitamin E History bleed tendency condition predispose bleed e.g . thrombocytopenia , abnormal liver function , liver disease ( e.g . chronic hepatitis ) , gastrointestinal ulcer Candidate surgery undergone surgery past 6 month Current past use ( last 3 month ) antithrombotic drug antiplatelets ( aspirin , ticlopidine ) , anticoagulant ( heparin , warfarin ) , thrombolytic agent ( streptokinase ) , etc Current past history cancer Pregnant/ breastfeed woman Smokers Drug alcohol abuse Hypercholesterolemia Chronic condition uncontrolled hypertension , heart disease ( ischemic heart disease , heart failure , cardiac arrhythmia ) , uncontrolled diabetes , HIV infection , psychiatric illness/ social situation might limit adherence study protocol . Unable unwilling stop taking vitamin , herbal preparation nonprescription medication
